H0.text: Which modern day country was known until 1981 as British Honduras. Guatemala

H1.text: Which modern day country was known until 1981 as British Honduras. Honduras

H2.text: Which modern day country was known until 1981 as British Honduras. Nicaragua

H3.text: Which modern day country was known until 1981 as British Honduras. Beliz

A4.text: On 1 June 1973, British Honduras was officially renamed Belize.

A5.text: Belize was granted independence on 21 September 1981.
